means: 显示努力的，充满努力的，需要努力的

sentence.Network_en: Your training has to be not only consistent, but also effortful.
sentence.Network_cn: 把锻炼当成那么一回事去进行.

auth_sentence.content: They don't stop regulating themselves at all levels, they just submit to a more automatic kind of control that is not effortful.
auth_sentence.res_content: They don't stop regulating themselves at all levels, they just submit to a more automatic kind of control that is not effortful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They don't stop regulating themselves at all levels, they just submit to a more automatic kind of control that is not effortful.

auth_sentence.content: Living in the present IS bounded by a form of self-control, it is just a less explicitly effortful form of control.
auth_sentence.res_content: Living in the present IS bounded by a form of self-control, it is just a less explicitly effortful form of control.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Living in the present IS bounded by a form of self-control, it is just a less explicitly effortful form of control.

auth_sentence.content: What we need to give up more is the experience of effortful trying to control, not the virtue of self-control.
auth_sentence.res_content: What we need to give up more is the experience of effortful trying to control, not the virtue of self-control.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What we need to give up more is the experience of effortful trying to control, not the virtue of self-control.
